Reviews.Content: stayed night feb 16 2010 home se asia priceline 42 plus taxesfees stayed 411 corridor 5 late getting refurbished wallpaper peeling carpet badly wornstained bathroom complete rehab etc probably proverbial priceline desk clerk nearly 600 standard upgraded lately looked liked mine hard believe positive bed clean comfortable lots pillows lobby floor id consider 3 stars 1 star dump walking distance lax free shuttle
